summary: An Ordinance appropriating the sum of $30.00 from the Water Fund and ordering the same paid to Arthur P. Sherry as a rebate of excessive assessment against lot 16, block 3, Terry's Fourth Addition, for the laying of a water main in Main Street, et al, under Ordinance No. 12565, creating Local Improvement District No. 1108, and repealing Ordinance No. 13729, approved May 16, 1906.
